title: High Ping
body: i've been getting some lag which was very rare before last weekend and i've played with a bunch of people with high ping since then too

replies.body:
League is always online, so connection issues can be common and cause by a lot of different factors like local issues or even how your ISP is reaching the game servers.  You can use our [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview of your specific issue to get a clear idea of the situation.

If this is still an issue for you, I suggest running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot towards a stronger connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
